name: Watermelon Radish
description: Watermelon radishes are round roots with white skin and bright red or deep pink flesh. They have a sweet, delicious taste and can be eaten raw in salads, pickled, or cooked. They are best sown in summer or fall, as they will bolt from spring sowings.
sowing_method: Direct seed, thin to 5cm apart when seedlings are 3cm tall
